_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
mn70:4.8+mn70:4.11: the mendicants who followed Assaji and Punabbasuka

mn70:6.17: the mendicants who followed Assaji and Punabbasuka

mn70:10.4: the mendicants who followed Assaji and Punabbasuka
before^mn70:10.4^where: the land of the Kāsīs, Kīṭāgiri
where: the land of the Kāsīs, Kīṭāgiri
mn70:10.10: the mendicants who followed Assaji and Punabbasuka
